name: Shoothill
description:
Shoothill provide a full end-to-end service for the custom development of all kinds of solutions, including Web Development, Mobile Application Development, API solutions and Data Visualisation, for both consumer and corporate audiences alike.
Using powerful technologies, our team of specialist developers is able to create stunning visuals and tailor-made solutions that will transform your complex statistical or geographic data into dynamic and accessible formats. Previous clients have included The Environment Agency, Control Risks, GEOResults, MSN, LOCOG, DreamWorks and Disney.
